messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] kindle fire
messages.msgSnippet: Try libraries - I saw that my local library is offering a few items to check out (for free) for Kindles. Amazon also has really cheap movies / TV shows to
messages.messageBody:
Try libraries - I saw that my local library is offering a few items to check out (for free) for Kindles.

Amazon also has really cheap movies / TV shows to purchase.



AND for those that don't know ;) Amazon has free downloadable apps for iPhone, Windows PC, Mac, Blackberry, iPad, Android, Windows Phone 7 so you can purchase their downloadable items without having to purchase a Kindle. I got free apps for our lap tops and our tower last winter.


Lisa W.

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: kindle fire
messages.msgSnippet: Hello group. I was a member and I unsubscribed for a while and am back for more inspiration. I just got a kindle fire for my three year old son. Any suggested
messages.messageBody:
Hello group. I was a member and I unsubscribed for a while and am back for more inspiration.

I just got a kindle fire for my three year old son. Any suggested apps, free is best, but also ones with a small charge? He loves superheroes, LOVES trucks and skulls on daddy's ipad, and enjoys paint programs. he is very responsive to sound. Any experience with amazon prime's movie selection?
